text: Hey channel, Is there a way to set up a notification for new HubDB listings? We use one of our HubDBs for events and would like to send subscribers a notification each time a new event is listed? HubSpot chat said there isn't a native way to set up notifications, but that this forum might have some ideas.
never tried it but maybe you could do it with a workflow automation
Personally though I’d rather manually kicck off the notifications. had marketers mess up HubDBs too often on accident to have the updates always trigger a notification
Good point. Say we go the workflow way, how do you set up the triggers, I didn't see anything specific to HubDB
if there isn’t something specific to HubDB, you might have to have a server ping the HS hubDB api, then trigger the workflow. Think there’s a way to make workflows trigger off of an api

hey channel, I'm creating multilevel dynamic pages using hubdb. I'm trying to add multiple images to row in hubdb table  using third party server for adding data to the table. I'm finding trouble while adding image to the table, rest of the form fields are adding data well...While selecting image from form image field, it is taking image from file manager. And that column in table is not rendering image.
